# walk-these-ways

This directory contains assets from the
[walk-these-ways](https://github.com/Improbable-AI/walk-these-ways) project.

## License

MIT License - Copyright (c) 2022 MIT Improbable AI Lab

See [LICENSE](LICENSE) file for full license text.

## Contents

**`unitree_go1.pt`** - Pretrained actuator network for Unitree GO1 robot, copied
from walk-these-ways (commit `0e7236bdc81ce855cbe3d70345a7899452bdeb1c`).

## Citation

If you use this actuator network, please cite the walk-these-ways paper:

```bibtex
@inproceedings{
  walktw2023,
  title={Learning robust perceptive locomotion for quadrupedal robots in the wild},
  author={Kumar, Ashish and Fu, Zipeng and Pathak, Deepak and Malik, Jitendra},
  booktitle={Science Robotics},
  year={2023}
}
```

## Original Repository

https://github.com/Improbable-AI/walk-these-ways
